about_the_game:
About the game

An explicit erotic visual novel following the story of two gorgeous women taking advantage of their boss’s luxury private jet AND the hot futanari flight attendant in their pursuit of joining the Mile High Club as they return from a business trip.

Visual Novel Description

Becky and Jessie are the newest additions to a very successful FinTech owned by the one and only Mr. Kim – also known as the youngest self made billionaire in the world.

Young, hot, and incredibly talented – the pair propelled the company to new highs with a carefully planned and executed advertising campaign. So Mr. Kim rewarded their incredible results with a luxury ride in his state of the art private jet as they return from a business trip.

That can only mean one thing – a once in a lifetime opportunity to join the coveted MILE HIGH CLUB in great style…If only they can find a way to convince the flight attendant to make herself busy in the cabin for an hour or so…

Claire Tate hit the jackpot when she was chosen to work on a billionaire’s private jet. Ridiculously fat tips, a very relaxed schedule, and a one of a kind opportunity to be a regular in that very exclusive “Private Jet Mile High Club”...If only the self made billionaire would’ve been interested in her cock.

Will Becky and Jessie manage to get rid of the flight attendant and fulfill their fantasy? Or will Clare surprise them by joining in their Mile High Fun ?
Follow their story and find out…
